name: Amnesia (itch) (SkipsMan)
description:
First version to be released.

Release 0.9.1(A)/0.9.2 (PROTO)

Fixed "MOON2.png is not available" bug (I hope)

EDIT: Nope! See below!

Changed resolution to 800x600 (4:3)

Known Bugs:

There's about 8 minutes of gameplay

It doesn't work at all because it doesn't like the x:\game\images\ dir to 

be the place the images are stored.

Added title card/updated cover image (sorry that it's still lame)

[August 10th, 2018: I'm lazy, so I'll fix the bug in build 0004,

But I'm also nice, so I'll tell you how to fix it now:

Simply move the files out of the "Image" directory

and into the "Game" directory, okay?

(Copy: X:\game\images to X:\game\)
